overview: Songwriter and entertainer Drs. P. often let his public roll over the floor with laughter with his absurd songs, but his personal life also knew a dark side. The documentary 'De Terugkeer van Drs. P.' (The Return of Drs. P.) doesn't simply show a hilarious but also a painful image of the virtuoso who rarely showed anything of his personal life.
title: The Return of Drs. P.
